summary: A critical documentary about the war on terror since 9-11.
cast: John Pilger|John Bolton|Reed Brody|Wesley Clark|Douglas Feith|Denis Halliday|William Kristol|Margaret Ladner|Charles Lewis|Ray McGovern|Taj Mohammad|Richard Overy|Sima Samar|Jo Wilding|Andrew Wilkie|Omar Zakhilwal
keywords: weapon of mass destruction|taliban|afghanistan|september 11 2001|war on terrorism
title: Rompiendo el silencio: verdades y mentiras sobre la guerra contra el terror
